mapper.select: select pid, p.bno, bname, clarge, cmedium, csmall, pname, pprice, pdetail, t01_imageurl, t02_imageurl, t03_imageurl from product p join brand b on p.bno = b.bno where pid=#{pid}
select pid, ccolorcode, cimage1 from color where pid=#{pid}
select pid, pname, pprice, (select bname from brand b where b.bno=p.bno) as bname, t01_imageurl, t02_imageurl from product p
select pid, bno, clarge, cmedium, csmall, pname, pprice, pdetail, t01_imageurl, t02_imageurl from product where bno = #{bno}

SELECT p.*, (select bname from brand b where p.bno=b.bno) bname FROM (select rownum rn, pid, pname, pprice, t01_imageurl, t02_imageurl, bno from (select * from product where clarge = #{param2} and cmedium = #{param3} and csmall = #{param4})) p WHERE p.rn > (#{param1.pageNum} -1) * #{param1.amount} and p.rn <= #{param1.pageNum} * #{param1.amount}
select count(*) from product where clarge = #{param1} and cmedium = #{param2} and csmall = #{param3}
